website_summaries.verdict: An electric griddle with a great feature set and cooking performance.
pros: Large surface and reversible plates for griddling and grilling
cons: Unit is relatively large, so storage may be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was I wrong!, I originally said how great this was. After using it for a few months now, I’m really disappointed with it. At first, everything slid off and was easy to clean. Now everything sticks and you end up with dark bits that are almost impossible to get off. I hand wash and don’t use any abrasives on it. Update: I contacted Oster and they said to use Pam (I guess their non-stick griddle needs a non-stick spray to make it non-stick?). I did that and ended up with another huge mess with black bits on the griddle that are impossible to get out. This is what it looks like. To say I’m disgusted is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: imaquilter55

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold consistent temperature!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill last October and have used it quite a bit between now and then. I really wanted to like this grill but it does not hold temperature. I am satisfied with everything else but have verified with an infrared thermometer temperature swings of up to 100 degrees. This makes cooking breakfast pancakes or eggs correctly nearly impossible and the grill nearly useless. The grill itself is also quite thin and this probably contributes to the temperature problem. When I cook pancakes I can never tell if I will get an undercooked cake or one with a scorched line where the heating element circles the grill.
customer_reviews.author: B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very uneven heating (bad batch?)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on its great reviews, but the first one, and it's replacement have cooked highly unevenly (see photo of my striped pancakes). I wonder if Amazon was shipped a bad batch of them, because I can't imagine people would claim that it heats evenly if they had this experience. I love everything else about the griddle, but a griddle that doesn't cook right is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Howes

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this skillet after reading other reviews that said this model cooks evenly. I had previously been disappointed with a Farberware skillet that cooked very unevenly, so this was important to me. This model did not disappoint. When cooking French toast or pancakes, there was no noticeable difference in browning between the edges and the middle. I also like that the griddle easily disconnects from the base, making it very easy to clean. I definitely recommend this skillet!
customer_reviews.author: T. Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Initially the grill was great to use
customer_reviews.text: Initially the grill was great to use. However, after several months everything started to stick to the grill, no matter what type of oil or butter that was used. Eggs are impossible to cook without sticking. Looking up the reviews on the Oster site, confirmed that many others have had the same issue. I have updated my review for this griddle. Oster has agreed to replace the griddle with a newer version. Hopefully, they have improved the surface on the new grill. Their customer service was quite receptive to my issues with the griddle.
customer_reviews.author: O.L. Sword

customer_reviews.title: Griddle DEAD only 4 months old!!!!!!. but have a new one on its way!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this griddle when we first got it Jan 3rd 2017, Now the thing doesn't even heat up, I tried 3 different plug ins and none of them work. Really mad after only 4 months I have a griddle that doesn't heat up. Wonder how I can get a replacement for it! Got a number from Amazon and called it and they are sending me a new one, so very happy since I love this grill!
customer_reviews.author: TammyM

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: This griddle works fine. My biggest gripe is the non-stick surface. Within a week, it started to fail. But I continued to use it. It's been 10 months now since I bought it and the surface is bad. See photo..... and that's not food stuck on it. This is the surface gone to the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I researched numerous griddles and weighed the pros and cons of each brand. I am happy with this purchase. Used for an indoor hibachi style meal along with a couple other (brand new) griddles that family brought. In comparison to two other brands, this proved to be the best. It cooked evenly, heated quickly, and was by far the easiest and fastest to clean. It's a little more spendy than others, but the quality is worth it. Love the reversible option as well. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: petes2

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly
customer_reviews.text: So, I researched grills quite a bit on Amazon before purchasing this one. I was getting one for my husband and what was important to us was even heating. This had the most reviews that said it heated things evenly and that is accurate. We can cook four large grilled cheese sandwiches at a time and quite a lot pancakes on this, with nice even heating. I recommend this grill. Careful when flipping something over for the first time. It's super non-stick and your pancakes or other food may go flying!
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 months now and I really love it. The design and quality of the materials is really nice. The cooking surfaces are heavy and sturdy. The non-stick seems to work very well. I use it to cook eggs, pancakes, hash browns for breakfast. For lunch and dinner, it's great for cooking steak and fried noodles. I use it 2-3 times a week foe the past many months and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Shopper

customer_reviews.title: the temperature wonderfully consistent throughout
customer_reviews.text: Nearly a year on and I have not had a single issue with my oster. I use it daily to cook eggs, bacon, pancakes, etc. The clean up is a breeze, the temperature wonderfully consistent throughout, and it has had clear durability. Best part? I can store it away and still have plenty of space in my tiny apartment. If you're debating if it's worth it, it is!! Make your mornings a little easier and brighter this new year. Invest in a better way to make breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces to clean
customer_reviews.text: The grill part works just fine however, it is not very large if you have a family of 7+. Also, there are too many pieces to clean. With lots of small spaces that get dirty, the ribbed grill side is difficult to clean. A large one piece flat grill would suit our large family much better.
customer_reviews.author: joe bennett

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Christmas gift I bought myself this year! It is really my favorite kitchen toy now. Breakfast potatoes, eggs and bacon cooked all at the same time! What? Nice cross hatch on my steaks in the winter when it's too cold to fire up the Weber grill! What? Nonstick surface cleans up with a wet paper towel! What? Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Boyd

customer_reviews.title: It Griddle Time...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A few things I should warn before purchasing however. The grease tray doesn't match the grease holes on the cooking tray exactly so sometimes if the tray is shifted, it will miss as any grease or food particles fall through. The base has two thin arms that hold the grease tray up and one of mine in one corner was broken, not causing the above problem, and not enough to warrant a return, but enough to mention due to the price of the item. It cooks Great on both sides and is very easy to clean. The detachable base makes storage so much easier. It is great quality overall and I am glad to have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cox

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This Grill/Griddle get hot and get hot fast. Read one report that it doesnt get hot enough. I cant agree. We have gone thru a few and this is by far the hottest. One suggestion. If cooking a thick steak or chicken place a cover over it. It will cook much faster. Lets face it, nothing is truly better to cook on other that a gas or charcoal grill. I would definately recommend this product. One catch it doesnt really clean great. It cleans up well but eventually leaves some staining. Oh anther thing I would still recommend a non stick spray or olive oil just to make sure your eggs come off nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kestas Parakininkas

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Control Broke-500 degree surface on lowest setting!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the griddle less than a dozen times. Had some sticking issues which I overlooked. Recently I tried to make pancakes and noticed that even on a low setting they were burning. I used an infrared thermometer and was alarmed to see the griddle heat to over 500 degrees on the lowest setting! There was no way to control the heat rendering this an expensive and useless product for me.
customer_reviews.author: CKL

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I was expecting, but usable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a "Wolfgang Puck" reversable griddle that I liked very much. It works reasonably well, except it turned out to be smaller than I expected, and the thermostat controller seems cheaply made, the knob wobbles and it doesn't seem to be very durable. The griddle itself is easy to clean and non-stick, which I do like, the "Puck" griddle has a teflon-like coating that started to wear off almost immediately. This one does not have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Hall

customer_reviews.title: this is agood littleunit i and many foodies would like to se a more eaven heating please some one ...
customer_reviews.text: this is agood littleunit i and many foodies would like to se a more eaven heating please some one add a double heat element most of us do not have a12/24 kitchen i have tried a lot of these units i this one is ok am shure the first one to get is to market will be a winner aa14/16 inch would be good start some one please make thosands of good coo and food freaks happy good happy cooks make long time coustmers
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BE WARE!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY! You will have better luck using a cookie sheet with nonstick spray on the stove. After using the double sided griddle about 10 times, everything sticks... Eggs , pancakes, grilled cheese, etc. I wish I would have read more from other buyers. Hopefully we can save others money.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance mclernon

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy w the
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying this grill. It is one of the only ones that was non toxic and it certainly works well. My pancakes don’t stick at all. I am very happy w the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Terrific dual-purpose grill
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Grill...Well-made and very sturdy. This grill is just great for grilling things on a flat surface (eg: pancakes) or if you flip it over, then you can use that side of the grill for cooking meats,veggies, etc. Highly recommended. Also great for potlucks!
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Sticky surface
customer_reviews.text: We have used this about 15 times to make pancakes at 350 degrees and they stick to the surface every time. This product was a complete waste of $70 dollars. We expected a much better product from Oster. At 2 to 3 times the cost of other griddles, we will probably buy another Presto for $20. We don't know if we will risk the high cost of Oster products again.
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: I seasoned this grill/griddle exactly how they recommended it. This works great
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I used this grill/griddle for a couple of months, because of all the negative comments. I seasoned this grill/griddle exactly how they recommended it. This works great!! I notice some of you say it sticks, but I notice if my food is not cooked completely, it will stick. Also, if you're cooking bacon, make sure your bacon grease is drained in the middle drainage area, if you pour it in the side holes, it will go off the medal drip pan and onto the plastic area. I use no sprays, butter, oils, etc.. I really love my Oster ECO DuraCeramic Reversible Grill and Griddle. Mrs. Wade Russell
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It really is non-stick. The platen does not hold uniform heat... there are hot spots that really show up on things like pancakes. For first few uses the temp controller worked fine, but within a couple of months it lost it's accuracy, and now I have to slowly build up to correct cooking temp by adjusting dial in increasingly higher small increments, otherwise it goes out of control... i.e. if I initially set it to 350°F the temp shoots to over 450°, but if I slowly build up to 350° it behaves better, though it drifts (I purchased an infrared thermometer to monitor the actual surface temperature.)
customer_reviews.author: Tom Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy to clean - I just heat the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to clean - I just heat the grill slightly so whatever is on the grill "melts," wipe with a wet paper towel, then take to the sink for a quick wash and rinse. Takes less than 2 min. to clean! Cooks burgers, 'dogs, pancakes, eggs, bacon and french toast just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service and product
customer_reviews.text: Good service and product...does all that was expected...note that the non stick surface starts out great...backing soda and water works...however it becomes harder and harder to clean and remove staining/discoloration...
customer_reviews.author: Alene Shawver

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of what type of surface you are cooking on with it
customer_reviews.text: Like the convertibility, easy to clean, so far we like it really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Dumpster Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Temperature control is totally non-functional. I tried for 6 moths to learn how control the temperature. All my attempts were abject failures.. I finally gave up and threw the #$@%gd thing in the the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Duane M Woodwick

customer_reviews.title: Unit was excellent to use and is working great
customer_reviews.text: Item as advertised and arrived on time as one item of three in one box. Unit was excellent to use and is working great. A little butter, spray oil, turns out excellently for my cooking. Heats up fast and took some time to guage settings for cooking. I like this item and use it everyday. Well satisfied with product. Will use seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Vernonmpegram

customer_reviews.title: Impossible
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so hard to clean this product; but to no avail. I have not used it in about 2 months and now it cannot be returned. It is not convenient to use. It is not helpful to me if I have to use much effort to clean and it does not come clean. what a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: albina plate

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but could use little improvements
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my griddle. I love this for many reasons. However I wish the surface was a bit bigger. I also wish the outside edge was a bit higher. Many times when trying to flip eggs or pancakes they fall off the back. Need to use a second utensil to stop that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: LRZ

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a year ago for our vacation house and never opened it. We finally opened the package to make pancakes for Mother's Day brunch. It appeared fine, but there was no heating element in the box...none! What a disappointment that something we saved for a special day is now sitting in it's box. We would like a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Gibson Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: I use this almost daily! I do not have ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily! I do not have any problems with food sticking to it, either side. Make sure not to use any oil or abrasives and use plastic utensils only.
customer_reviews.author: N. RALLO

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to ceramic coating, hard to cook, pain to wash
customer_reviews.text: Bought this indoor grill instead of my old one that served for many years. It’s bulky, the plug with temperature control dial sticks out and adds at least 3 more inches to the length, but the main drawback is the ceramic coating: everything sticks to it. Waste of money. Wish I returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: maiv

customer_reviews.title: Starting to show wear
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for first few uses. 9 months of using weekly & I'm starting to get a buildup around what I assume are the heating elements & food is now starting to stick to those spots.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: is not stick clean like it saids but cooks well if you can deal with the splashing grease when cooking meat.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Oster Ceramic Surface Grill and Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I'm having a good time trying various foods to grill or cook on the griddle. In the morning I can sit outside on the deck and cook pancakes or eggs for the whole family at once because of its large size, and the ceramic surfaces are truly non-stick. Clean up is so easy. I like the Oster brand, have bought a number of their appliances over the years. The price is right, and the Oster products have always been well built (often glass and metal parts instead of plastic) and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to clean. Maintains even temperature across griddle so pancakes/french toast etc brown evenly. Good size-big enought not to take forever to cook batch of pancakes or french toast but not too big to take up a lot of storage area.
customer_reviews.author: AlleyOop

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my mother, she uses it all the time. She says that it heats evenly with no cold spots.
customer_reviews.author: Rdney W.

customer_reviews.title: YEAH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Xmas and he just loves it. so now I'll buy one for my nephew for his wedding. Love those no brainer presents. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbie

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews! This product needs it! After 3 months of light use, the temperature control broke and at 300 it registered 450!! It scorched the surface ! Now there is no temperature control and everything sticks!! Many others warn you...even 4 star reports! BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: glenn strauss

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was a skeptic of the non-stick properties based on the ceramic stove-top fry pans I've bought in the past. It's definitely a superior ceramic coating in comparison. Pancakes with zero sticking and zero added oil. Wiped clean and then grilled pork chops for dinner (needed to use a little foil to cover while cooking) and clean up was hot water and a rag, no elbow grease required. Wish I could find fry pans with the DuraCeramic coating.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated Customers

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Over a year later we love this. Pancakes and grilled cheese come out perfect. Grilling hamburger easy and clean up easy. Love have both sides to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Robson

customer_reviews.title: Falls short
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's okay, but not the really slick surface I expected. Pancakes, especially those with blueberries and/or bananas, stick. After a couple of tries,, I found that treating the surface with an oiled paper towel took care of the problem. Considering this was supposed to be the best griddle out there, I'm not that impressed. I have a frying pan, (Contempoary Cooking) that has such a slick surface that nothing sticks, which was what I was expecting, but didn't get. So, back to the drawing board guys, you can do better.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Clean-up in less than 1/2 a minute.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money for that alone. Also large cooking surface, much more than the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: David Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Everything Sticks To This Terrible Grill
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely terrible. It was no-stick for about two days and then everything started sticking to it. To get it clean we had to scrub it, which only made it worse. We can't cook anything on it besides cuts of meat because everything is destroyed when you try to leverage it off of the crappy "no-stick" grill. I have to say I'm very surprised by the reviews, this thing is such a disappointment. Less than three months later and we need to buy another grill to replace this one. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of using the grill and griddle the unit won't stay hot. Something about the power supply loses contact and doesn't go into the grill all the way to keep consistent temperature. I contacted Oster hoping maybe I could get a replacement power cord. I was informed that I was no longer in warranty (something I already knew) but the rep who emailed couldn't be bothered to give me a part number or a price to get a replacement cord. Product is decent. Customer service is terrible. I have a grill I can't use simply because Oster couldn't be bothered to sell me a power cord.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rana

customer_reviews.title: Yet heats evenly & has a great non-stick surface on both sides
customer_reviews.text: A bit large to store. Yet heats evenly & has a great non-stick surface on both sides. And I love that it is dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Cocomotive

customer_reviews.title: Two sided grill/griddle makes this an exceptional appliance.
customer_reviews.text: I love the removable aspect of the grilling surfaces. It is easy to lift out and wash in the sink. The lower tray catches overflow and also lifts out for easy cleaning
customer_reviews.author: jdg

customer_reviews.title: Nothing sticks/easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: This is such an awesome product. We have used it primarily to cook bacon, no fuss, no mess. The drip pan collects all of the grease, it is easy to empty. Nothing sticks to the cooking surface and it is so easy to clean. We have not used it for the warming tray yet, but I am excited to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O.

customer_reviews.title: Superb non stick performance.
customer_reviews.text: There are cosmetic defects that do not affect performance but are slightly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: wolga

customer_reviews.title: the ceramic is SUPER efficient. so cooking pancakes
customer_reviews.text: this will stain and it takes practice to cook on. the ceramic is SUPER efficient. so cooking pancakes, for example, I can only go as high as 300 deg or they will burn every time. it took me about three sessions to finally work it out. But overall I am really happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: NorthCarolinaBound

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a mess to clean up. The holes that allow the grease to drip onto the catch pan do not line up with the catch pan. Unbelievably bad design. I seasoned the griddle as called for in the directions and the first time I made pancakes, the non-stick surface failed. Pancakes stuck. Worst product I have bought in a while.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used it as grill/griddle. The 2nd time the grill was used for pork chops they got burned & got stuck; it was so hard to clean. Not recommending to buy this very expensive kitchen appliance that’s not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CMPS

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Love that it's has two types
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Love that it's has two types ,grill in one and smooth surface for pancakes and whatever. Didn't want to get the others that had aluminum so I'm glad I got this one. Kinda small but it works good.
customer_reviews.author: sierra8017

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to buy.....So glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: My kids asked over and over for a griddle. I finally broke down and bought one. This is awesome. It has been used numerous time for breakfast, lunch and dinner. My children use it all the time when I am not around. So easy to clean. I am very please with the way it is holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is touted as non-stick. That was true the first few times I used it but after only half a dozen uses everything sticks. I wrote the company and had no response.
customer_reviews.author: PatD

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Nothing sticks
customer_reviews.text: I've used this griddle once. So far so good. Nothing sticks. If you are not careful, your food will slide right off onto the table. Like I said, nothing sticks. And I do like that. I would buy this again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: sandy in lou.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I really never write reviews but this griddle is so stellar that I just have to share my joy! It is so nonstick (with zero oiling required) that the first pancake I flipped flew off of the griddle and onto the countertop😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this product back in 2015 and I continue to enjoy it immensely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in 2015 and I continue to enjoy it immensely. The ceramic surface is very effective for cooking, it is easy to clean afterwards, and is clearly very durable as I have used it at least once a week since the product was purchased. Solid product, and well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: fluke189

customer_reviews.title: Reversible grill
customer_reviews.text: Best small griddle/grill I have ever owned. I wish the tray and griddle top clicked in to keep in all together when getting it in and out of the cabinet. Otherwise, the heating and grilling compoents are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S K B

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY disappointed is this product
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed is this product. The plug does not fit tightly, and the power goes off and on so it does not cook properly. I would like a plug that doesn't fall out!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Truly non-stick. Very adjustable temp and it gets much hotter than one would ever need. Smoke is minimal and works well indoors. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: GARY BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean because tray lifts out
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a couple of months now. It does take a couple minutes longer to reach temperature, but well worth it for how even and well it holds temperature. Easy to clean because tray lifts out. The only wish i have is a slightly larger griddle size. 6 month update. Sorry to say that the grill no longer holds a steady temperature an does not heat evenly. Too bad because I really liked it at first.
customer_reviews.author: clyde p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-made. Easy to clean. Doesn't stick. Love that the materials are non-toxic.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Oster grill reversible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill, bought 3 of them 2 for gifts and they love them also. So easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Besler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NON-STICK
customer_reviews.text: Just gotta love the no-stick. Need absolutely NO spray, no butter, no oil, no nothing, just the food. Pretty even heating, much better than our last grill
customer_reviews.author: Mapper

customer_reviews.title: Truly non-stick ceramic surface
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. Ceramic is truly non-stick with no fear of teflon issues. When my old one goes at the cabin, this will be the replacement!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect and clean up
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time to grill salmon. It was perfect and clean up....a breeze:)
customer_reviews.author: JanSuth

customer_reviews.title: Not all ceramic surfaces are created equal!
customer_reviews.text: I wish people would write reviews after using the product for a while. In this case, it would have kept me from purchasing it and finding out how poorly it held up to almost daily use after less than 2 months, but more than the 30 days allowed for a return. The grill is slick at first, and then becomes stickier and stickier, even at low temperatures. It becomes hard to keep clean, and after while you need to use oil to keep food from sticking to it. It's a vicious cycle, since browned oil is almost impossible to clean off the grill, especially from its edges.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tomas

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COUNTER TOP GRIDDLE I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: Love this Griddle, Sunday morning breakfast is a snap with it. Heats up fast and accurately. Did I mention easy to clean, not a problem as of now, I have been using it for one month and don't have any complaints. I would give it ten stars if I could....
customer_reviews.author: Sluggo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: love the ceramic grill plate---a joy to clean--nice grill--smaller than my other grill but like it better, getting used to the size

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this. Food doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Food doesn't stick. Cleanup has been easy, even in the case of sauces that are cooked on that would have led to self-loathing with other grills. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Schul

customer_reviews.title: Oster ceramic reversible grill and griddle
customer_reviews.text: this worked fantastic and has a great coating of ceramic and is soooo easy to clean and use cooks anything and everything very well for my mother she loves it and uses it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my DuraCeramic grill
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job. I am glad to use a safe grill, since I have threw away all Teflon products. The only complaint I have, is that there is no way for the grease to drip easily. It is totally level, from what I see. Over all, I recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: ndavis

customer_reviews.title: Oster Ceramic Reversible Grill / Griddle
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent grill. Very well made and totally non stick so no need to use any oil or butter. It will last a long time as long as you don't use any abrasives to clean it. I only use a soapy sponge and warm water and it cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Best griddle I've ever OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I use this griddle every single day, easy to use, easy to clean, I just love it and the only thing I can say is I'm sorry that I didn't get one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my mother and sister one each. I enjoy making breakfast on this griddle very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fran Corleone

customer_reviews.title: No Replacement Parts Available
customer_reviews.text: I love the grill. Very easy to use. Easy to clean. The problem is that I accidentally dropped the grill part after cleaning and the handle broke. I called their customer service department and they told me there were no replacement parts for this model. So it is great until you need to purchase a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this electric griddle
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly and evenly. I really like this electric griddle. Plenty of cooking surface for my needs. Really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S60T5

customer_reviews.title: Slick grill
customer_reviews.text: Heats quicker and more evenly than any grill I’ve ever used. Cleans faster and easier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Worster

customer_reviews.title: Too Bad it Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this griddle about six months ago I thought it was amazing. The non-stick coating worked really well, it heated fairly evenly, etc. Unfortunately after a few weeks of use, the non-stick stopped working well and I started to have brown spots along the heating elements that no amount of scrubbing would remove. I've always thought the temperature know seemed a little clunky for such a pricey griddle, but I was willing to overlook that. About two months ago, the griddle and indicator light started turning off on their own while cooking at lower temperatures (around 300 degrees). Now they turn off randomly at any temperature while I'm trying to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Welling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a dream to clean on the griddle side - a little tougher on the grill side. Even heating
customer_reviews.author: Walter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grill I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I have ever had. It does eggs it does steak it does hamburgers and it fits in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Philip A. Stein

customer_reviews.title: I wish the grease trap was deeper. Cooking too ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the grease trap was deeper. Cooking too much bacon and you have overflow. The power cord and knob thing is kind of flimsy. All of that said though. the product works well so far
customer_reviews.author: jfrebel

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean in that bacon grease, for example ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to clean in that bacon grease, for example, does not drain well, and when you help it along, it can drip outside the receptacle. Large, heavy and unwieldy
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Fabulously designed ceramic coated grill and griddle. We love grilling but without the bugs, so this offers us a great indoor option in the summer heat. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and pictures with their perfectly made pancakes sent to me in gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: sonia clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle
customer_reviews.text: My very particular pancake-loving husband loves this griddle. Things don't stick to it and it's relatively easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and I get excellent results
customer_reviews.author: Safety Professional

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Cooks evenly and quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: IrishRose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Totally love my new Christmas present. I have now used both sides of this grill for pancakes and my vegan burgers. It cooks evenly and heats up quickly, leaving pretty char marks on my veggie burgers.
customer_reviews.author: Karrieann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome griddle and is truly non stick without the toxic substances.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome griddle and is truly non stick without the toxic substances.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE OSTER MUCH BETTER THAN MY WOLFGANG PUCK GRILL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE OSTER MUCH BETTER THAN MY WOLFGANG PUCK GRILL. NO HEALTH CONCERNS FOR MY PARROTS FROM BURNT NONSTICK COATING WHICH IS REALLY TOXIC TO BIRDS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best unit I've ever owned in my 73 years. Easy to clean and cooks like a dream. Nothing sticks.
customer_reviews.author: mike wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Remodeling my kitchen and this griddle works so good. I have to use it for six weeks
customer_reviews.text: Remodeling my kitchen and this griddle works so good. I have to use it for six weeks. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: such a cool griddle. works well
customer_reviews.text: such a cool griddle. works well, heats evenly. i do still have to use non-stick spray on it, but I'm ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Morghan Reid

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Works really well. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: TMaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even cooking and works great! We use it almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Use often for pancakes so far. No issues. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: redfirefly

product_meta.title: Oster Titanium Infused DuraCeramic Reversible Grill/Griddle, Black (CKSTGR3007-TECO)
product_meta.description: Offering the functionality of two appliances in one, the Oster Titanium Infused DuraCeramic Reversible Grill/Griddle converts from a griddle to an indoor grill pan with a simple flip. This electric griddle and indoor grill features a titanium-infused DuraCeramic PTFE- and PFOA-free, nonstick ceramic coating that won’t flake or peel even after extended use. The temperature control lets you precisely control heat and detaches smoothly from the unit when it’s time to clean up. The removable drip tray collects fat and grease to help promote healthier cooking. And thanks to its expansive 10- by 18-inch cooking surface, this indoor grill offers enough space to prepare meals for the entire family. For added convenience and easy cleanup, the base, cooking plate, and drip tray are all dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Reversible indoor grill/griddle pan with embedded heating element
Nonstick, PTFE- and PFOA-free ceramic coating won't flake or peel
Drip tray collects excess fat and grease for lighter, healthier meals
Dishwasher-safe base, cooking plate, and drip tray
Includes cool-touch handles for easy carrying
